meta.content: Small public schools where every student feels loved, safe, equipped and inspired to change the world.

div.a: RDSS (REIL Score, Resources and Video Bank)

span.a: RDSS (REIL Score, Resources and Video Bank)

div.p: On March 30, 2020, Arizona Governor Doug Ducey and Arizona State Superintendent of Public Instruction Kathy Hoffman closed all schools for the rest of the school year. All Maricopa County Regional School District (MCRSD) schools will continue teaching online, through video conferencing, and with non-electronic enrichment kits.

This is devastating news to all of us, but the health and safety of our community must be a priority. During this difficult time, our commitment is to deliver high quality and interesting learning opportunities to your child while staying as connected as possible.

Each week, learning materials, supplies, and food boxes can be picked up from school parking lots. (Check your school website to determine days/times.) If you are unable to make it to the school during the posted times, please call your school office to arrange for a different pick-up time or delivery.
We miss you all and ask you to stay safe!

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: El 30 de marzo de 2020, el gobernador de Arizona Doug Ducey y la superintendente de instruccin pblica del estado de Arizona, Kathy Hoffman, cerraron todas las escuelas por el resto del ao escolar. Todas las escuelas del Distrito Escolar Regional del Condado de Maricopa (MCRSD) continuarn enseando en lnea, a travs de videoconferencias y con kits de enriquecimiento no electrnicos.

Estas son noticias devastadoras para todos nosotros, pero la salud y la seguridad de nuestra comunidad deben ser una prioridad. Durante este momento difcil, nuestro compromiso es brindar oportunidades de aprendizaje interesantes y de alta calidad a su hijo mientras permanece lo ms conectado posible.

Cada semana, se pueden recoger materiales de aprendizaje, suministros y cajas de comida en los estacionamientos de la escuela. (Consulte el sitio web de su escuela para determinar los das / horarios). Si no puede llegar a la escuela durante los horarios publicados, llame a la oficina de su escuela para organizar un horario diferente de recogida o entrega.
Los extraamos a todos y les pedimos que se mantengan seguros!

div.a: View Distance Learning Plan--Ver plan de aprendizaje a distancia

div.h2: Meeting the social, emotional and academic needs of every student.

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-poster combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left image-linked

img.alt: Caring Culture - Building a culture of caring is our first priority. We all learn better when we feel cared for and know we are wanted in the community. We believe teacher-student relationships are everything.

div.p: Building a culture of caring is our first priority. We all learn better when we feel cared for and know we are wanted in the community. We believe teacher-student relationships are everything.

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-poster combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left image-linked

img.alt: Inspirational Instruction - It is our great privilege to immerse our students in creative inquiry every day. We think learning new things and making discoveries is awesome and we pass that feeling on to our students.

div.p: It is our great privilege to immerse our students in creative inquiry every day. We think learning new things and making discoveries is awesome and we pass that feeling on to our students.

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-poster combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left image-linked

img.alt: School Safety - We take safety very seriously. From teaching prevention to preparing for emergencies, our students are cared for and protected.

div.p: We take safety very seriously. From teaching prevention to preparing for emergencies, our students are cared for and protected.

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-poster combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left image-linked

img.alt: Equipped for the Future - When students leave us they will be more curious than when they arrived and more prepared for the next phase of their life. Whether that is higher education, career training or the job of their dreams. We prepare our students so their choices are limitless.

div.p: When students leave us they will be more curious than when they arrived and more prepared for the next phase of their life. Whether that is higher education, career training or the job of their dreams. We prepare our students so their choices are limitless.
